extensionDescription.message: Control where new tabs open and what happens after closing a tab.

statusSaved.description: Status message shown when settings are saved.

resetSettingTooltip.description: Tooltip for the reset button beside each setting.

resetAllButton.description: Button label to reset all settings to their default values.

newTabPositionLabel.message: When opening the New Tab page:
newTabPositionLabel.description: Label for the new chrome://newtab position setting.

foregroundLinkPositionLabel.message: When opening a link in the foreground:
foregroundLinkPositionLabel.description: Label for the foreground link position setting.

backgroundTabPositionLabel.message: When opening a link in the background:
backgroundTabPositionLabel.description: Label for the background link position setting.

afterCloseActivationLabel.message: After closing a tab, switch to:
afterCloseActivationLabel.description: Label for the post-close tab activation behavior.

optionDefault.description: Option to use Chromeâ€™s default behavior.

optionInsertLeft.description: Option to open the tab to the left of the current one.

optionInsertRight.description: Option to open the tab to the right of the current one.

optionInsertFirst.description: Option to open the tab as the first in the window.

optionInsertLast.description: Option to open the tab as the last in the window.

optionActivationLeft.description: Option to switch to the left tab after closing.

optionActivationRight.description: Option to switch to the right tab after closing.

optionActivationFirst.description: Option to switch to the first tab of the window after closing.

optionActivationLast.description: Option to switch to the last tab of the window after closing.

optionActivationHistory.description: Option to return to the tab that was active before the closed one.
